p: The higher absorbance of the extract indicates a higher ferric reducing power. As clearly seen from Table 5, the FRAP values for HLE, EALE, HRE and EARE were 0.090, 0.087, 1.120 and 0.900Â mmol Fe(II)/mg extract. This shows that the hexane extract of the roots of O. cufodontii exhibited the maximum reducing power. Because the root extract of O. cufodontii possesses antioxidant activity, it can be vital to human health.
